node.html: A dockerized solution to verify Green Passes evaluating its revocation status, the app communicates with Italian Gateway to fetch millions UCVI's relative to revoked passes and handle the verification of the presented GreenPass. The solution gives the possibility to use one out of four different persistence strategies so to offer different approaches to handle data.
An application that gives an overview of how a Registrar operates to manage all the operations that a Registrant requires.
A Java implementation of commons design patterns.
